terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: City Game Terms and Conditions

section1.title: §1 General Provisions
section1.point1: The organizer of the city game (hereinafter: "Game") is the musical group operating under the name "Oset", represented by Bartłomiej Leśniewski, email address: kontakt@oset-oktet.pl (hereinafter: "Organizer").
section1.point2: The Game takes place in the city of Gdańsk from the start date to the end date as specified in the application.
section1.point3: The Game is promotional in nature and aims to encourage participants to take part in an artistic event organized by the group.
section1.point4: Participation in the Game is voluntary and free of charge.

section2.title: §2 Participants
section2.point1: Only natural persons who have reached the age of 16 on the day of starting participation can participate in the Game. Persons under 16 years of age may not participate in the Game.
section2.point2: Participation requires registration in the web application and acceptance of these Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
section2.point3: Each participant may participate in the Game only once and may receive only one prize.

section3.title: §3 Game Rules
section3.point1: The participant scans NFC tags placed in various locations throughout the city of Gdańsk. Each tag corresponds to one location.
section3.point2: After scanning a tag, the participant registers their presence at a given point through the web application.
section3.point3: The first 5 participants who visit all locations will receive a one-time prize in the form of a concert ticket organized by the group.
section3.point4: The application informs the participant about the number of locations visited.
section3.point5: Participants must visit locations in person and scan NFC tags using their mobile device.
section3.point6: Any attempts to cheat, manipulate the system, or provide false information will result in immediate disqualification.

section4.title: §4 Technical Requirements
section4.point1: Participation requires a smartphone with active NFC function and internet access.
section4.point2: The application supports modern web browsers and mobile devices with NFC capability.
section4.point3: In case of technical problems, the participant may contact the organizer at the email address provided in §1.

section5.title: §5 Safety and Responsibility
section5.point1: The participant bears full responsibility for their safety during the game and while moving around the city.
section5.point2: The organizer is not liable for damages arising during movement or participation in the Game.
section5.point3: Participants are obliged to comply with traffic regulations and local laws.
section5.point4: Participants should exercise caution when visiting locations, especially in crowded areas or near traffic.

section6.title: §6 Prizes
section6.point1: The prize in the Game is 1 admission ticket to the group's concert, the date and venue of which will be announced on the website or in the application.
section6.point2: The number of prizes is limited - they will be received by the first 5 people who meet the conditions specified in §3.
section6.point3: The prize cannot be exchanged for a monetary equivalent or other benefits.
section6.point4: Winners will be notified by email no later than 14 days after completing all locations.
section6.point5: In case of inability to collect the prize, it will be forfeited. The prize must be collected personally by the winner.

section7.title: §7 Complaints
section7.point1: All comments and questions regarding the course of the Game can be directed to the email address: kontakt@oset-oktet.pl. The organizer considers submissions within 14 business days.
section7.point2: The organizer's decisions regarding complaints are final.

section8.title: §8 Personal Data
section8.point1: The principles of personal data processing are defined by the Privacy Policy, which is an integral part of these Terms and Conditions.
section8.point2: The participant consents to the processing of personal data to the extent necessary for the implementation of the Game.
section8.point3: Location data collected during the game is used solely for verification of visited locations and is not shared with third parties.

section9.title: §9 Final Provisions
section9.point1: The organizer reserves the right to change these Terms and Conditions for important reasons, in particular due to changes in legal regulations or changes in the date or format of the Game. All participants will be informed of any changes through the application or website.
section9.point2: In matters not regulated by the Terms and Conditions, the provisions of Polish law shall apply, in particular the Civil Code.
section9.point3: These Terms and Conditions come into force on the day of publication in the application and apply to all participants who register after this date.

terms.effective_date: Terms effective from the date of publication in the application

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.effective_date: Privacy Policy effective from the date of publication in the application

section1.title: General Information
section1.point1: The data controller for personal data of city game participants (hereinafter: "Game") is the musical group "Oset", represented by Bartłomiej Leśniewski, email address: kontakt@oset-oktet.pl (hereinafter: "Controller").
section1.point2: This Privacy Policy defines the principles of personal data processing in connection with participation in the Game and use of the web application for registration.

section2.title: Scope of Data Processing
section2.intro: The Controller processes the following data:
section2.data2: geolocation data (if the user consents to it)
section2.data3: technical data (e.g., IP address, NFC tag scanning time)

section3.title: Purpose and Legal Basis of Data Processing

point1.intro: Data is processed for the purpose of:

point2.intro: The legal basis for data processing is:
point2.basis1: Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR – consent of the data subject
point2.basis2: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR – legitimate interest of the Controller (e.g., ensuring security and proper conduct of the Game)

section4.title: Data Retention Period
section4.point1: Personal data of participants will be stored for 60 days after the end of the Game.
section4.point2: After this period, data will be deleted or anonymized.

section5.title: Data Sharing
section5.point1: Data may be entrusted to hosting, server, or IT service providers to the extent necessary for application operation.
section5.point2: Data will not be transferred to countries outside the European Economic Area, unless the provider ensures an adequate level of protection (e.g., under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework program).

section6.title: Participant Rights
section6.intro: The participant has the right to:
section6.right6: lodge a complaint with the President of the Personal Data Protection Office

section7.title: Voluntary Data Provision
section7.content: Providing personal data is voluntary, but necessary to participate in the Game and receive any potential prize.

section8.title: Contact
section8.content: For matters concerning personal data, you can contact the Controller via email: kontakt@oset-oktet.pl.
